name: christmas tree door basket
notes:
embrace the holiday spirit with our christmas tree door basket crochet pattern. this intermediate-level project features a seamless one-piece construction, worked from the bottom up, creating a textured design that adds charm to any space. the pattern includes detailed instructions to guide you through the process, making it a perfect project for those looking to enhance holiday vibes. the finished door basket is versatile and can be customized to suit your style, making it a delightful addition to your festive decor.
  
**unique features-**
  
• intermediate-level project for skill advancement
• seamless one-piece construction for a polished finish
• textured design adds depth and visual interest
• versatile customization options to suit your style
• video stitch tutorials included
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• hook: 8mm (us size 11.0)
• yarn: [bernat blanket](https://amzn.to/3kmc0kp) (super bulky weight, 120 yards)
